Package chess.model.moves

Class PlayerMove

java.lang.Object
chess.model.Colored
chess.model.moves.Movable
chess.model.moves.PlayerMove
All Implemented Interfaces:
chess.persistence.Codable
public final class PlayerMove extends Movable
A raw, "type-less" representation of moves made by any player that is to be interpreted, validated, and executed by ChessGame, serving as an input packet bearing only minimal information necessary to describe a movement initiated by some player.

This class encodes information about some player's move in the simplest form possible. Any additional information is considered inconsequential and any player should keep only what is defined in Movable and discard everything else when describing a movement.

    • PlayerMove

      public PlayerMove(Position initialPosition, Position finalPosition, Color color)
      Constructs a player's move with an initial position, final position, and the color of the initiator (described by Color).
      Parameters:
      initialPosition - The initial position of the movement.
      finalPosition - The final position of the movement.
      color - The color of the movement's initiator (White or Black).
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If any of the arguments is null.
